name: Driving School: Real Skill
description:
Driving School: Real Skill is the best city Traffic car driving simulator that will teach you to drive different cars and partk. This game feature amazing environment with realistic Traffic Tour and rules, challenging city environment. You can learn to drive and obey traffic rules as they are taught in driving school. Use a virtual steering wheel or many other control like arrows and device orientation options that suit your needs. Gain more knowledge of the road rules with this intuitive 3d driving academy.
Features
• Multi Level Sport Car Parking
• Lots of vehicles to unlock!
• Tutorial Mode for learning
• More than 20 detailed maps
• Smooth and realistic car handling
